LED Keychain: Create a keychain with an LED light that can be activated to make it more visible in low-light conditions.
Keychain with built-in USB Drive: Incorporate a small USB drive into the keychain to allow users to store and access files on the go.
Smart Keychain: Develop a keychain with built-in Bluetooth connectivity, allowing users to track their keys and locate them using a smartphone app.
Magnetic Keychain: Create a keychain with strong magnets to hold together multiple keys, making it easier to find and organize keys.
Eco-Friendly Keychain: Design a keychain made from recycled materials or sustainable materials to appeal to environmentally conscious customers.
